original_text: But perhaps a man may meet a young woman in a field in the country. She has already promised to marry another man. But the man is stronger than her and he has sex with her. If that happens, only the man must die.
korean_text: 만일 남자가 어떤 약혼한 처녀를 들에서 만나서 강간하였으면 그 강간한 남자만 죽일 것이요

sentences.original_text: But perhaps a man may meet a young woman
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 어쩌면 한 남자가 한 젊은 여성을 만날 수도 있다

sentences.original_text: in a field in the country
She has already promised to marry another man
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 이미 다른 남자와 결혼하기로 약속했다

sentences.original_text: But the man is stronger than her
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 남자는 그녀보다 더 강하다

sentences.original_text: and he has sex with her
